name: Deepak Poly
blog: Hello guys, welcome to MELOS! created by me >_<.. here you can send blogs, chats and more. chat with someone who is unknown or hide your identity with different name. Isn't it exciting guys! and, you are the BOSS here, how? you can delete any message you want even mine 'the admin!', just type the name and click delete, BANG! aaaandddd much more coming .... Thank you guys(adios)
